name: Haettu
description:
Haettu is a highly addictive pixel art, online, Battle Royale, Play to Earn game. 

We are looking to develop the next phase of the game, we already developed phase 1, but we are looking for more and start its marketing campaign also.

We are looking to add some online coop game mode to harvest "ads" money or tokens. Also we want to add a "battle pass" & "seasons", reward boxes, and more.
payDisclosure: This is a "under development project" but we want to release it very soon, we have designs for many armors and weapons which we want to sell as NFT's and also give as rewards in some cases.
